alert.note: Alert for Caddo; De Soto (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 11 at 4:20PM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Louisiana... Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake affecting Caddo and De Soto Parishes. For the Lakes...including Wallace Lake...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cypress Bayou At Wallace Lake. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 147.0 feet. - Forecast...Wallace Lake is forecasted to rise and crest to near 149.5 feet Friday morning. - Action stage is 149.0 feet. - Flood stage is 151.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. If you are in the advisory area, remain alert to possible flooding or the possibility of the advisory being upgraded to a warning. The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 1000 AM CDT.
